description: Denominator of (2n+1)(2n+2) B_{2n}, where B_n are the Bernoulli numbers. Also denominators of the asymptotic expansion of the polygamma function psi'''(z).
references: M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards Applied Math. Series 55, Tenth Printing, 1972, p. 260, (6.4.14).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 3..1000
M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards, Applied Math. Series 55, Tenth Printing, 1972 [alternative scanned copy].
M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards Applied Math. Series 55, Tenth Printing, 1972, p. 260, (6.4.14).
mathematica: Join[{1, 1}, Table[Denominator[(4 n^2 + 6 n + 2) BernoulliB[2 n]], {n, 1, 70}]] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 02 2013 *)
crossrefs: Numerators are in A076549. Cf. A006955/A002427.
author: _Simon Plouffe_
